revised_title: On the Equations of Rotation of a Solid Body: Analyzing Transformation and Integration
tldr: The author, William Spottiswoode, explores the equations of rotation of a solid body about a fixed point, focusing on transformation and integration. He develops formulas for various systems of coordinates and discusses the application of these equations in understanding the motion of solid bodies. This work contributes to the field of solid mechanics and the study of rotation dynamics.
